articles.author: tellman
articles.title: A Jail to End All Jails
articles.description: De Blasio promises to close the Rikers Island jail complex in ten years. But what comes next? A look at the island’s history reveals clues — and cautions. The post A Jail to End All Jails appeared first on Urban Omnibus.

articles.author: Olivia Schwob
articles.title: What Jail Can’t Do
articles.description: Frank Greene and Kenneth Ricci discuss the changing paradigms of half a century of justice architecture and what we should ask — and expect — from courts and jails. The post What Jail Can’t Do appeared first on Urban Omnibus.

articles.description: Reflecting the underside of society, prisons aren’t generally a pleasant topic of conversation. Many question whether the nation’s nearly 5,000 penitentiaries do more harm than good in reducing crime. Nonetheless, prisons have been with us throughout our hist…
